FROGMAN ADVENTURES

Frogman Adventures is a game that I created using C# in the Unity 2D engine. It was my first time playing around with Unity and experimenting with game development, and includes custom music (thanks Noah!), menus, player lives, a highscore and fastest time system, prefabs, singletons, and more! Try it out below!
